review: When it works it is fantastic.  The problem is that I am now on my third remote.  For the first two, the remote would work for about a week and then the batteries would go dead.  I used seven sets of batteries in seven weeks.  Customer service has been great and was quick to send me new remotes when I complained.  The third remote is working fine now and I am very happy with the product.
